roleset.name: register membership in
roleset.note: ENROLL-V NOTES: Agent and entity enrolled are often the same; use arg0 for these cases. (from enroll.01-v)
ENROLLMENT-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, enroll.01. Corresponds to VNcls involve-107. (from enrollment.01-n)

example.name: enroll-v: intransitive?
example.text: The plan is talking about applicants admitted, not students who [*T*-1] enroll.

example.name: enroll-v: sorta transitive
example.text: At the Baltimore firm of Weinberg& Green, [new corporate and banking associates]-1 are required [*-1] to enroll in a 20-class course.

example.name: enroll-v: all args
example.text: John enrolled Mary in an anger-management program.

example.name: enrollment-n: args 0, 1
example.text: In the three years since the Post-9/11 GI Bill took effect, colleges have nearly doubled their enrollment of student veterans...

example.name: enrollment-n: args 1, 2
example.text: Hannaford asked Forte to escort the former Marine, who served two tours in Iraq, to a nearby office to help facilitate his enrollment in the university.

example.name: enrollment-n: with EXT
example.text: The problem is not rising and falling enrollment , that 's just normal demographics . In fact , lately in my country they 've been building schools modularly so they can be turned into house when the families with young kids in the neighbourhood grow older and do n't need them anymore .
